verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When He rolls up His sleeves He ain't just puttin' on the ritz.
Our God is an awesome God.
There is thunder in His footsteps and lightning in His fists.
Our God is an awesome God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord wasn't joking when He kicked 'em out of Eden.
It wasn't for no reason that He shed His blood.
His return is very close and so you'd better be believin' that
Our God is an awesome God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Our God is an awesome God He reigns
From heaven above
With wisdom power and love
Our God is an awesome God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When the sky was starless in the void of the night
Our God is an awesome God
He spoke into the darkness and created the light.
Our God is an awesome God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Judgement and wrath He poured out on Sodom.
Mercy and grace He gave us at the cross
I hope that we have not too quickly forgotten that
